r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with memcached via libmemcached library
r.d: This extension uses libmemcached library to provide API for communicating with memcached servers.
r.n: - Add touch() and touchByKey() methods - Add resetServerList() and quit() methods - Support binary protocol in sessions - Make it work with libmemcached up to 1.0.4 - Test against PHP 5.4.0
